description:
I was hacked via a fake "Hyperliquid" app on Google Play (developer: SPINUTRI NUTRITION JSC). I imported my seed phrase, leading to unauthorized transactions starting Dec 1, 2025 ~17:16 UTC. Stolen assets: - SOL/USDC/JUP to 3BsUKtTkVNSaf3YD6qvMmwwuueb1Fk781ThjSyTMbMtd (~$50-100) - BTC 0.024 to bc1pqwd09m3rfd62eueu26y2wmsvwzdyvyjujxntl34zfaqhwyxd0x7uqyty (~$2000) - HYPE 20 to internal bridge 0xF2a1e66e...b8265 (tx: 0x1e4959da50fce955d7319970c2ec4bf65c1203c0efa6b80, ~$689)

I was hacked via a fake "Hyperliquid" app on Google Play (developer: SPINUTRI NUTRITION JSC). I imported my seed phrase, leading to unauthorized transactions starting Dec 1, 2025 ~17:16 UTC. Stolen assets: - SOL/USDC/JUP to 3BsUKtTkVNSaf3YD6qvMmwwuueb1Fk781ThjSyTMbMtd (~$50-100) - BTC 0.024 to bc1pqwd09m3rfd62eueu26y2wmsvwzdyvyjujxntl34zfaqhwyxd0x7uqyty (~$2000) - HYPE 20 to internal bridge 0xF2a1e66e...b8265 (tx: 0x1e4959da50fce955d7319970c2ec4bf65c1203c0efa6b80, ~$689)

Amount lost

2000.00 USD
